entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3 except 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clearing. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3 except 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High 6 except 12 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
